query.name: ChromosomeRegion_AllGenes
query.view: Gene.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.featureType Gene.symbol Gene.name Gene.organism.shortName Gene.qualifier Gene.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.chromosomeLocation.strand Gene.description
query.longDescription: Retrieve all genes located within the specified chromosome and coordinate range.
query.constraintLogic: C and D and E and A

template.name: Chromosome_Gene_FeatureType
template.title: Chromosome-->Genes of a selected Feature Type

query.name: Chromosome_Gene_FeatureType
query.view: Gene.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.featureType Gene.qualifier Gene.symbol Gene.name Gene.organism.shortName Gene.description

query.name: DOTerm_AllGenes
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.featureType Gene.diseaseAnnotation.ontologyTerm.identifier Gene.diseaseAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Gene.diseaseAnnotation.evidence.code.code Gene.diseaseAnnotation.evidence.withText Gene.diseaseAnnotation.evidence.publications.pubMedId Gene.diseaseAnnotation.evidence.publications.pubXrefId Gene.organism.shortName
query.longDescription: Retrieve all genes annotated to a specified Disease Ontology (DO) Term.

template.name: DOTerm_Children_AllGenes
template.title: DO Term name [and children of this term] --> All genes

query.name: DOTerm_Children_AllGenes
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.featureType Gene.qualifier Gene.diseaseAnnotation.ontologyTerm.identifier Gene.diseaseAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Gene.diseaseAnnotation.evidence.code.code Gene.diseaseAnnotation.evidence.withText Gene.diseaseAnnotation.ontologyTerm.parents.identifier Gene.diseaseAnnotation.ontologyTerm.parents.name Gene.diseaseAnnotation.evidence.publications.pubMedId
query.longDescription: Retrieve all genes that are annotated to the specified DO term and children of that specified DO Term. Wild card queries (such as *progeria*) are supported.

template.name: DOTerm_DOTermIdentifier
template.title: DO Term name --> DO Term Identifier

query.name: DOTerm_DOTermIdentifier
query.longDescription: Retrieve the DO term identifier (DOID) and description for a specified DO term name. Wild card queries (such as *syndrome*) are supported.

template.name: GOTerm_GeneOrganism
template.title: GO Term name [and children of this term] -->All genes

query.name: GOTerm_GeneOrganism
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.featureType Gene.qualifier Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.namespace Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.code.code Gene.goAnnotation.qualifier Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.code.withText Gene.goAnnotation.annotationExtension Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.parents.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.parents.name Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.publications.pubMedId
query.longDescription: Retrieve all genes that are annotated to the specified GO term and children of that specified GO Term. Wild card queries (such as *ascospore*) are supported. Only manually curated and high-throughput GO annotations are included.

constraint.description: Show genes annotated with GO term (and any children of this GO term):

query.name: GOTerm_Genes
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.featureType Gene.qualifier Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.namespace Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.code.code Gene.goAnnotation.qualifier Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.code.withText Gene.goAnnotation.annotationExtension Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.code.annotType Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.publications.pubMedId Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.publications.citation
query.longDescription: Retrieve all genes annotated to a specified GO Term. Manually curated, high-throughput, and computational GO annotations are included. To also retrieve annotations to child terms use the GO Term name [and children of this term] -->All genes template.

query.name: Gene_DOTerm
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.featureType Gene.diseaseAnnotation.ontologyTerm.identifier Gene.diseaseAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Gene.diseaseAnnotation.evidence.code.code Gene.diseaseAnnotation.evidence.withText Gene.diseaseAnnotation.evidence.publications.pubMedId Gene.organism.shortName
query.longDescription: Retrieve all Disease Ontology (DO) annotations for a specified gene. Wild card queries (such as *YAL*) are supported.

query.name: Gene_Description
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.name Gene.organism.shortName Gene.briefDescription Gene.description
query.longDescription: Retrieve genes with an automated gene description.

query.name: Gene_GOTerms
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.featureType Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.namespace Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.code.code Gene.goAnnotation.qualifier Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.code.withText Gene.goAnnotation.annotationExtension Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.publications.pubMedId Gene.organism.shortName
query.longDescription: Retrieve all GO annotations for a specified gene.

query.name: Gene_GenomicDNA
query.longDescription: Retrieve genomic DNA (DNA sequence with introns) for the specified gene.

query.name: Literature_GO
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.featureType Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.namespace Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.code.code Gene.goAnnotation.qualifier Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.code.withText Gene.goAnnotation.annotationExtension Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.publications.pubMedId
query.longDescription: Retrieve GO annotations made from a specified PubMed ID (PMID).

query.name: Organism_Genes
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.name Gene.briefDescription Gene.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.chromosomeLocation.strand Gene.organism.shortName Gene.featureType
query.longDescription: Retrieve Genes of a given Organism.
